Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
<MYNAME>. <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Please, we have something we need to ask of
you.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
I'm Jolyne and this is Zazie. We are two of Lady
Elise's maids.

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
We would be forever grateful if you could come
to the manor immediately.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
A few days ago, Lady Elise fired our animal
handler and no one else on the farm knows how
to take care of the cows!

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Lady Elise herself tried, but she has no prior
experience handling livestock. Now, one of the
cows has fallen ill.
<PAGE>
That came as a devastating blow to the Lady.
She's been staying with it, trying to nurse it back
to health, but nothing seems to be working.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Please, will you come with us?
<PAGE>
At this rate, Lady Elise will work herself sick
tending to that cow!

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Th-thank you so much! Hurry, this way!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Why...? Why won't you get any better?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Come now, don't give me that pitiful little cry.
You're going to be fine. I'm going to make it all
better, I promise!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Answer me! Please!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Somebody! Somebody, help! I don't care who it
is, just save this poor creature!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>. Please...you have to help her.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Lady Elise! She's getting better!
<PAGE>
Whoa, it looks like she accidentally ate some
garbage. No wonder nobody knew how to help
her.

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Oh, thank goodness!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Yes... Thank goodness...

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Lady Elise? Lady Elise! Oh no! Hurry, let's get her
to her room!

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
<MYNAME>, please help us carry her!

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>.

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Yes. You've done so much for Lady Elise.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
L-lady Elise! Please return to your room!

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Think of your condition!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be fine. Let me speak with <MYNAME> for a
moment, please.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Yes, my lady. If you need anything, please don't
hesitate to call for us.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I owe you a debt of gratitude.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What, do you intend to spurn me? Allow me to
give thanks where thanks is deserved.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
With your help, the life of one of my cows was
saved. Your expertise made all the difference.
Thank you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This whole incident has truly opened my eyes to
how much I still don't know about farming.
<PAGE>
I have always left all the day-to-day work to my
servants. I suppose...I was a farmer in name
only.
<PAGE>
One of my own cows was in pain, yet the most I
could do was beg help from the newest farmer
in town.
<PAGE>
I couldn't do a single thing myself to help that
cow. It makes me feel so helpless.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I do, however, still have my pride.
<PAGE>
I must admit that the whole reason this
happened is because in truth, I don't know
much about how to run a farm.
<PAGE>
So, as of today, I've decided to stop relying so
heavily on my servants. I'm going to try a more
hands-on approach to running this farm.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Just you watch, <MYNAME>! Someone as gifted
and skilled as I will have no trouble mastering
farm work!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SPECIAL>O-HO-HO-HO-HO!
